title: Load a 3-band TIF image and overlay Dirt Tracks
description: This is a quick demonstration of how to load a TIF, display it, and then overlay polygons of one of the feature types, POOR_DIRT_CART_TRACK. I used tifffile to load the image because it's easier to install than GDAL, and the files don't have headers anyway so there's no advantage to GDAL.  I used matplotlib to handle polygons, although I should mention that some of my other code uses openCV for some polygon operations.
